title: Did Mitch McConnell blow up President Trump to get a haircut?
subtitle: Senator McConnell's office denied a story in Fire and Fury that was supposed to indicate the low point in Trump's and McConnell's business relationship.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In August 2017, when tensions between President Trump and the majority leader of Senate Mitch McConnell reached their highest level, the latter refused to call a meeting with the President because he had a haircut date.
